name: Crypt map
description: This odd, hand drawn map points the crypt(s) in its range. There's no actual road going there, but it's an enough information for you.

use_action.message: You add the Crypt(s) to your map.

name: Vampire Cove map
description: This odd, hand drawn map only points the vampire cove. There's no actual road going there, but it's an enough information for you.

use_action.message: You add the Vampire Cove to your map.
